CONCLUSION: Remainder inadmissible;No violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions;Possessions)
JUDGES: András Sajó;Krzysztof Wojtyczek;Nona Tsotsoria;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque;Vincent A. De Gaetano
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a request with ORG no . PERSON ( ORG ) seeking compensation for assets owned by her ancestors and transferred to ORG . On DATE ORG issued a decision whereby the applicant was entitled to compensation of ROL CARDINAL ( approximately EUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL at the time ) .

CARDINAL . DATE the applicant lodged several applications with ORG ( hereinafter “ the ORG ” ) and the President of GPE for payment of the compensation . On each occasion , the applicant was informed that her file was subject to ratification by the responsible authority for implementing PERSON no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued the ratification decision , confirming the applicant ’s entitlement to PERSON PERSON ( approximately ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL at the time ) . The decision mentioned that the payment would be made in CARDINAL DATE instalments , as provided for by the methodological rules for the implementation of the law , in force since DATE and amended on CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . To date , the applicant has not received the compensation or any indication as to when such compensation would be paid .
